name: LIFE Interactive
overview:
Life Interactive, based in Bangalore, was founded in 2001 by Antony Robinson. Antony has 26 years of continuous experience in IT and has played the lead role in IT departments of several multinational organizations. Every member of Life Interactive shares Antony’s passion for perfection, attention to detail, and a commitment to deliver web solutions of the highest standards. A proof of this is the number of patrons in various countries. Most of these patrons are ambassadors for Life Interactive.

At Life Interactive, you get access to 45 highly experienced .NET, PHP, Flash AS3, iPhone and Facebook developers, along with SEO & Social Media Marketing Experts, UI Designers to take care of all Usability and Look ‘n’ Feel aspects.

Other areas of expertise are complete customization of Joomla Content Management System based websites and Magento based ecommerce solutions.

We have a fully equipped web development facility in Bangalore. Our team includes passionate and experienced members who are specialists in their respective fields . We have more than a decade of individual experience in ASP.NET, PHP, Flash ActionScript, JavaScript, AJAX, SQL Server, XML, CSS/DIV- based HTML, User Interface Design, Usability, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Marketing and Web Analytics . We have also studied user behavior patterns and changing web trends throughout our existence as a web development company.

All our projects go through a well-structured life cycle to ensure that the output not only meets, but also exceeds your expectations. Our multi-layered planning system gives us the edge to harness all the cutting-edge technologies to deliver your projects on time.

Social Responsibility

We believe that every human being has the right to equal opportunity. We support the work of HOPE worldwide and Home of Faith, organizations that are committed to alleviating the suffering of people and offering hope to thousands of disadvantaged children, youth and adults.
